metadata.title: The 2009 influenza A (H1N1) pandemic Management and vaccination strategies in The Netherlands

abstract.original_text: A large number of organizations were involved in the pandemic preparations. These preparations included development of multisectoral guidelines, strengthening of surveillance, strengthening of diagnostic surge capacity, preparing commu-
